text: The Grazer Herbstmessepokal (Graz Autumn Fair Cup) was the first major competition outside of Vienna and was held on the occasion of the Graz Autumn Fair with different participants. Austria soccer ==History== There were only competitions in the years shown. ===1906=== Participants *Grazer AK I *Grazer AK II *Grazer Sportvereinigung I *Grazer Sportvereinigung II ===Final=== ===1907=== Participants *Grazer AK *Grazer Sportvereinigung *Rapid Wien *Wiener Sportclub ===Final=== ===1908=== Participants *Germania Schwechat *Grazer AK *Grazer AK II *Grazer Sportvereinigung *Vorwärts Graz * Wiener Sport-Club ===Final=== ===1909=== Participants *Germania Schwechat *Grazer AK *Grazer Sportvereinigung ===Final=== ===1910=== Participants *Grazer AK *Grazer Sportvereinigung I *Grazer Sportvereinigung II ===Final=== ===1911=== Participants *Deutscher ASC Eiche Cilli *Grazer AK *Grazer Sportvereinigung *Knittelfelder SV *Marburger SV *Sturm Graz ===Final=== ===1913=== Participants *1.
